page.title: 13The School.
page.content: The P.T.A. raise a lot of money for the school and we help by doing a sponsored obstacle every year. We decorate the school when our parents have parties like the Medieval Banquet or the Mad Hatter's Party. At Christmas we give a concert for our mums and dads. We had an open day and invited some of the old people to school. They told us what school was like years ago. Some children have school dinners at Â£3.50 a week but most children have packed lunches. The school dinners come from Midsomer Norton in a school meals van. It also brings the meals for the old people twice a week. The kitchen at Midsomer Norton is going to close at Christmas and we might have frozen dinners. I like going to Beckington school and so do my friends.
